reviewText: well he comes, he tries and he fails...as the title may tell you. he gets vaquished again..hehe my advice is if you like DBZ enough then get it. if you don't like it, then don't get it. most people find more flaws in dbz than what they like about it, thus hating it. i like it so much that i plan on getting all of the DVDs. so if you're in my position, then get it and this one you will like!
